reviewText:
This introductory resource gave a very good but brief explanation about the work of Amy P and Magda G
I had hoped that the dvd would have provided me with a little more content related to actual application of the fundamental principles of Amy and Magda's infant work.  However, I truly respect the RIE work and am glad to have the dvd.  I just think the price of the dvd is a bit high for the amount of content it offers.
